Package terrapeer.vui.j3dui.control.mappers.intuitive

Interface Summary
SourceDragTarget This interface serves as a target for source drag events, where the drag position is defined relative to a space defined by a source node.
 

Class Summary
AbsoluteSourceDragPlugin A source drag filter plugin that interprets drags with an absolute drag origin (i.e.
AxisAngleSourceDragPlugin A source drag mapper plugin that maps an axis-angle rotation from source space to target space, where the rotation axis is defined in the source space relative to the source node and mapped to the target space.
DirectSourceDragPlugin A source drag mapper plugin that directly maps source drag value dimensions to target actuation value dimensions.
DrmDragPlugin An intuitive drag mapper plugin that performs the first half of Display Relative Mapping (DRM) by mapping from 2D input drag space to the Z=0 pane in the 3D source drag space.
IntuitiveDragMapper A coordinate mapper that translates a 2D input drag space position into an intuitive 3D source drag space position as defined by a personality plugin.
IntuitiveDragMapperPlugin An abstract base class for intuitive drag mapper plugins.
PseudoWrmDragPlugin A WRM drag plugin that appears to perform WRM but involves no source node picking.
QuasiWrmDragPlugin A WRM drag plugin that picks the source hit point and node only at the start of the drag instead of throughout the drag.
RelativeSourceDragPlugin A source drag filter plugin that interprets drags with a relative drag origin (i.e.
SourceDragFilter A source drag event filter whose action is defined by a personality plugin.
SourceDragFilterPlugin An abstract base class for source drag filter plugins.
SourceDragMapper A dimension mapper that translates a 3D source drag into an actuation output as defined by a source drag mapper personality plugin.
SourceDragMapperPlugin An abstract base class for source drag mapper personality plugins.
SourceDragSplitter Splits (multicasts) the source event to multiple event targets.
WrmDragPlugin An intuitive drag mapper plugin that performs the first half of World Relative Mapping (WRM) by mapping from 2D input drag space to 3D source drag space.
